name: cogent
description: Cogent is a Copilot extension that gives it agenting capabilities like executing commands, editing and reading files, and more.

diffUpdate.description: Auto confirm diff-based file update operations (cogent_diffUpdate)

cogent.autoConfirmTools.description: Configure which tools should auto-confirm their operations without showing confirmation dialog

cogent.debug.description: Enable debug logging in the output channel

cogent.allowExternalFileCreation.description: Allow CreateFileTool to create files outside the workspace root when enabled (use with caution).

cogent.allowExternalFileEdit.description: Allow DiffUpdateTool to read and update files outside the workspace root when enabled (use with caution).

languageModelTools.name: cogent_removeFile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Delete a file or directory in the workspace. Use recursive=true for directories.

languageModelTools.name: cogent_createFile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Create a new file in the workspace, creating parent directories as needed. Set overwrite=true to replace existing files.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite if file exists

languageModelTools.name: cogent_runCommand
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute a shell/OS command in the workspace. Accepts a single `command` string (include any flags in the string) and an optional `path` to set the working directory. Optionally specify `timeoutMs`.

command.description: Full command string to run (include flags in the string, e.g. "npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies")

path.description: Working directory (relative to workspace or absolute)

languageModelTools.name: cogent_diffUpdate
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Apply precise diff-based updates to existing files. Searches for exact text and replaces it with new content. Provides context validation and multiple match detection.

path.description: Relative path to the file to update

search.description: Exact text to search for and replace

replace.description: Text to replace the search text with (use empty string for deletion)

context.description: Number of context lines to show around the match (default: 3)

validateOnly.description: Only validate the search without applying changes

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
